edu.smcm.ai.search

Class AdversarialGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.smcm.ai.search.AdversarialGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TicTacToeGame

    public abstract class AdversarialGame
extends java.lang.Object
    An adversarial game. It provides the interface described in "Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach" (Third Edition) by Russell and Norvig on p. 162.

      AdversarialGame()

      Obtain the starting state of the game.
      abstract Player player(AdversarialState state)
      Obtain the player whose turn it is.
      abstract AdversarialState result(AdversarialState state, Action action)
      Obtain the state that results from taking an action.
      abstract boolean terminalTest(AdversarialState state)
      Determine if the game has ended.
      abstract double utility(AdversarialState state)
      Determine the utility of the state.

        Determine if the game has ended.
        Parameters:

      • utility

        public abstract double utility(AdversarialState state)
        Determine the utility of the state. This is only valid if terminalTest(state) is true.
        Parameters:
        state - state of interest
        Returns:
        utility of state

      • actions

        public abstract java.util.List<Action> actions(AdversarialState state)
        Obtain a list of valid actions in this state. The order of the actions in the list is arbitrary.
        Parameters:
        state - state of interest
        Returns:
        list of valid actions
